name: Holy Scripture
description: The authority, sufficiency, and interpretation of Holy Scripture as the rule of faith and life.

name: God and the Holy Trinity
description: The one true God: His being, attributes, and the three persons of the Trinity.

name: God's Eternal Decree and Predestination
description: The eternal, wise, and holy counsel of God's will, including election, predestination, and reprobation.

name: Creation and Providence
description: God's work of creating all things and His ongoing preservation and government of the world.

name: The Fall and Original Sin
description: The fall of man, original sin, the corruption of human nature, and the state of free will.

name: Christ the Mediator
description: The person, natures, offices, and saving work of the Lord Jesus Christ as the only Mediator between God and man.

name: Salvation: Calling, Justification, and Sanctification
description: The application of redemption: effectual calling, justification by faith alone, adoption, sanctification, repentance, and perseverance of the saints.

name: The Law and the Gospel
description: The moral law of God, its uses under the covenant of grace, and the gospel of Jesus Christ.

name: The Church and Its Government
description: The visible and invisible church, its marks, officers, councils, and the communion of saints.

name: The Sacraments: Baptism and the Lord's Supper
description: The nature and efficacy of the sacraments, the administration of baptism, and the Lord's Supper.

name: The Civil Magistrate
description: The authority and duties of the civil magistrate in relation to the church, oaths, and marriage.

name: Death, Resurrection, and Last Judgment
description: The state of souls after death, the resurrection of the body, and the final judgment at the last day.
